metadata.title: CVE-2022-38860 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Certain The MPlayer Project products are vulnerable to Divide By Zero via function demux_open_avi() of libmpdemux/demux_avi.c which affects mencoder. This affects mplayer SVN-r38374-13.0.1 and mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu1.1
mplayer - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu1.1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu1.1').
